title: Crabclaw Isle

properties.name: description
properties.value: Crabclaw Isle is a small island just south of the Hosidius coast. Players can reach the island by paying Sandicrahb 10,000 coins. Completing the easy Kourend & Kebos Diary will allow players to access it for half the price. Completing the medium Kourend & Kebos Diary will allow players to access the island for free.

content:
Not to be confused with Crabclaw Caves.
Crabclaw Isle
Released17 November 2016 (Update)
MembersYes
LocationWestern Sea, Great Kourend
InhabitantsSand Crabs
TeleportsSandicrahb (10,000 coins)
Map
Advanced data
Typeisland

Crabclaw Isle is a small island just south of the Hosidius coast. Players can reach the island by paying Sandicrahb 10,000 coins. Completing the easy Kourend & Kebos Diary will allow players to access it for half the price. Completing the medium Kourend & Kebos Diary will allow players to access the island for free.

There are 40 sand crabs scattered throughout the isle, with several spots containing three/four crabs near one tile.
